name: width
description: Image width. 0 = max width
label: Width

name: height
description: Image height. 0 = max height
label: Height

name: exposure
description: Time in µs (1000000µs = 1 sec)
label: Exposure

name: gain
description: Light sensitivity. Starts at 0. A high value returns a brighter image but more noise too
label: Gain

name: gamma
description: Changes the difference between light and dark areas. A hight value increases contrast
label: Gamma

name: brightness
description: Changes the amount of light in the image. Low value = dark. high value = bright
label: Brightness

name: wbr
description: Red component for the White Balance
label: Red balance

name: wbb
description: Blue component for the White Balance
label: Blue balance

name: bin
description: 1 = binning OFF (1x1), 2 = 2x2 binning, 4 = 4x4 binning
label: Binning

name: delay
description: Delay between images in milliseconds. 1000ms = 1 sec.
label: Delay

name: type
description: 0 = RAW8, 1 = RGB24, 2 = RAW16
label: Image Type

name: quality
description: Range for a PNG image: 0-9. Range for a JPG image: 0-100
label: Quality

name: usb
description: Values between 40-100. This is BandwidthOverload
label: USB bandwidth

name: filename
description: No whitespaces in filename. Extensions allowed: .jpg or .png
label: Filename

name: flip
description: 0 = Orig, 1 = Horiz, 2 = Verti, 3 = Both
label: Flip

name: text
description: Text Overlay
label: Text Overlay

name: textx
description: Text Placement Horizontal from LEFT in Pixels
label: Text X

name: texty
description: Text Placement Vertical from TOP in Pixels
label: Text Y

name: fontname
description: Font Types (0-7), Ex. 0 = simplex, 4 = triplex, 7 = script
label: Font Name

name: fontcolor
description: BRG value of text color. 0 to 255 for each channel
label: Font Color

name: fonttype
description: Font Line Type, 0 = AA, 1 = 8, 2 = 4
label: Font Type

name: fontsize
description: Text Font Size
label: Font Size

name: fontline
description: Text Font Line Thickness
label: Font Weight

name: latitude
description: Latitude of the camera
label: Latitude

name: longitude
description: Longitude of the camera
label: Longitude

name: nodisplay
description: Set this parameter to 1 to capture images without using a desktop environment. Uses less CPU
label: No Display

name: timelapse
description: Set this parameter to 1 if you want to create a timelapse at the end of the night
label: Timelapse

name: time
description: Adds the time to the image. Combine with Text X and Text Y for placement
label: Time

name: darkframe
description: Set to 1 to disable time and text overlay
label: Darkframe
